duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service to guests and ensure a positive dining experience.
Adhere to company's standards for food quality, cleanliness, and presentation.
Collaborate with kitchen staff and servers to manage reservations, seating, and overall guest flow.
Handle guest inquiries, complaints, and special requests in a professional and timely manner.
Assist in coordinating and executing special events and promotions as needed.
Maintain a clean and organized work environment to ensure guest satisfaction and safety.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Hospitality or Customer Service certification preferred)
